static void changeSIMPIN ( ULONG  simPINId,
CHAR *  pSIMPINOld,
CHAR *  pSIMPINNew,
RIL_Token  t 
) [static]

Change the SIM PIN.

Parameters:
simPINId the SIM PIN Id carrying value of either 1 or 2
[in] pSIMPINOld the old SIM PIN
[in] pSIMPINNew the new SIM PIN
t the RIL token identifier
Returns:
none
static void delayedSIMReady ( void *  param  )  [static]

Call-back function to send delayed SIM_READY notification.

CHAR *  pSIMPIN,

Parameters:

t the RIL token identifier

CHAR *  pSIMPUK,
CHAR *  pSIMPIN,
RIL_Token  t

Enter the SIM PUK.

Parameters:
simPUKId the SIM PUK Id carrying value of either 1 or 2
[in] pSIMPUK the SIM PUK to be entered
[in] pSIMPIN the SIM PIN to be entered
t the RIL token identifier
Returns:
none
int getPINRetryCountQMI ( void   ) 

Try using QMI API to get retry count for PIN.

Currently only support PIN1. May be expanded to other values later.
